original_text: Now when those hired first came, they thought they would receive more, but each of them also received a denarius.
korean_text: 먼저 온 자들이 와서 더 받을 줄 알았더니 그들도 한 데나리온씩 받은지라

sentences.original_text: Now when those hired first came,
they thought they would receive more,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 많이 받을 줄 생각했으나,

sentences.original_text: but each of them also received a denarius.
